tier.item: tá-ci náwe te cáa peecia-dai-pá-ri ma-pái ci
our-REF mother house each dizzy-CMP-HAB-PRES that-only REF

singer sings until she (the shaman) revives.'

tier.item: (a) De turist-er som åkte till Island fick mycket sol, medan
DTM tourist-Pl REL went to Island got lot of sun while
de turist-er som åkte till Italien fick regn varje dag.

who went to Italy had rain every day.'
